title: 2014 Titan Esports Ex6TenZ Jersey
description: Titan Esports has always been one of my favorite esport org logos with an infamous history in Counter-Strike. These jerseys are extremely rare and almost impossible to find nowadays.

title: 2019 eUnited Simp Jersey
description: A rookie eUnited jersey signed and worn by Simp during the 2018-2019 CoD BO4 season. This jersey was either worn at Fort Worth when he won the AM open or during the London event.

title: 2018 FaZe Clan Olofmeister Jersey
description: A 2018 FaZe Clan Jersey signed and worn by Olofmeister during the 2018 season of Counter-Strike: Global Offensive. x2 Major, x1 Major MVP, Best Player of the Year in 2015, Olof is one of the most well-known names in Counter Strike.

title: 2014 Team LDLC Shox Jersey - Signed
description: This is a 2014 Team LDLC jersey worn and signed by Richard 'shox' Papillon. This is a special team jersey for myself and shox as this was the team he won his first and only major for. This is the early 2014 design of the jersey.

title: 1 of 1 OpTic Gaming 2019 Championship White SCUF Controller (Production Sample)
description: This 1 of 1 OpTic SCUF was created and owned by AaronCreate. Information about the general release can be found here: https://x.com/AARONCREATE/status/1106319125205389312

title: 2024 Atlanta FaZe Simp Player Jersey - Signed
description: Verified player-issue with authentic tournament sponsors and signed by Simp.

title: Signed OpTic Gaming Hockey Jersey
description: OpTic Gaming hockey jersey signed by Hecz, Scump, Diesel, AaronCreate, Hitch, Shotzzy, Dashy, Kenny, Pred, Methodz, TeePee, Karma, Crimsix, MerK, Clayster, Pamaj, Daltoosh, and FormaL

title: 2017 OpTic Gaming Lethul Player Jerseys - Black & Championship White
description: Verified player-issue with authentic tournament sponsors. Includes both the black and white championship variants worn by Lethul during the 2017 season.

title: Custom Team Summertime Autographed Gamecube Controller
description: Verified autographed custom Team Summertime Gamecube controller. Signed by the entire Team Summertime squad: Hitch, Jorge, and Blake. A unique piece won from the auction during the Off Season event.

title: 2017 Splyce Zer0 Champs Game Worn Jersey
description: Zer0, former Call of Duty professional, was known as one of the best European players. He wore this jersey at the 2017 Call of Duty championship while playing for Splyce. This jersey is known to be 1/4.

title: 2017 Splyce Zer0 Unreleased Jersey
description: Zer0, former Call of Duty professional, was known as one of the best European players. He was given this jersey while playing for Splyce, but the jersey was never released.

title: 2019 100 Thieves Priestahh Game Worn Jersey (Signed)
description: Priestahh, often referred to as one of the best flex players in his prime and 1x Call of Duty champion, wore this jersey while playing for 100 Thieves.

title: 2019 OpTic Gaming MENTAL Signed Game Worn Jerseys (Black and Championship White)
description: Billy MENTAL Putnam was a 22x Gears of War champion. He wore these jerseys while playing for OpTic Gaming. He was part of OpTic Gaming from 2016 - 2019.

title: 2023 TYLER 'ABEZY' PHARRIS Signed Game Dated Moments Major IV Upper Deck Card
description: ABEZY is a Call of Duty professional that played for Atlanta FaZe. This card depicts a moment during Major IV of the 2023 season. It is authenticated by The Upper Deck Company.

title: OpTic Gaming Hector 'HECZ' Rodriguez Signed Baseball Card
description: HECZ is the owner of OpTic Gaming. He is one of the most active owners in esports and leader of the GREENWALL.

title: 2024 Call of Duty League Championship - Hosted By OpTic Gaming Suite Badge and Ticket
description: For the first time ever, the Call of Duty League Championship was hosted in Allen, Texas by OpTic Gaming. The badge was for the Suite Level of the Credit Union of Texas Event Center. During the Friday of the event, the digital ticketing system was down during the early morning resulting in the issuance of the physical ticket that is included.

title: 2011 Infamous APG Player Worn Jersey
description: In 2011, APG, a Halo World Champion, played for Infamous. This was a team that ended up taking down the “God Squad” of Team instinct to win the event as their first time as a squad.

title: Upper Deck Call of Duty 2023 Gold Solo Ink Set
description: Upper Deck Call of Duty 2023 Gold Solo Ink Set. Each card within the set is limited to only 30 copies. 69 cards in total. Took around 12 months to obtain all 69. This is one of only 3 known complete sets in the world.

title: 2019 Chicago Huntsmen Arcitys and Sender Jerseys
description: In 2019, the Call of Duty League created franchising. Formerly OpTic Gaming, HECZ created the Chicago Huntsmen. Arcitys, a 2x Call of Duty champion, played for the Huntsmen. Sender, a former player, coached the Huntsmen.
